title: Texas Investigates Parents Over Care for Transgender Youth, Suit Says - The New York Times
content:
1. Texas Investigates Parents Over Care for Transgender Youth, Suit Says  The New York Times
  2. Travis County commissioners push back on state 'abuse' investigations into transgender health care  KXAN
  3. Texas anti-trans directive has parents of trans kid angry and afraid  The Washington Post
  4. Texas begins investigating parents of transgender teens for child abuse, according to a lawsuit. One parent works in the department involved in the investigations  CNN
  5. Abbott sued over Texas transgender care investigation order  POLITICO

description: The investigations by the stateâ€™s Department of Family and Protective Services started last week with an employee of the agency, according to the suit, after Gov. Greg Abbott called for such inquiries.
